title: Initialize MAUI Project
body: Create new MAUI solution. Copy starter code into /src. Verify it builds & runs on emulator.

title: Install NuGet Dependencies
body: Add packages: CommunityToolkit.Mvvm, sqlite-net-pcl, Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Maps

title: Setup AppShell Navigation
body: Add tabs: Breweries, Notes, Events, Map. Register detail routes.

title: Create Brewery Model & Service
body: Define Brewery.cs model. Add BreweryService with JSON seed.

title: Brewery List Page
body: Show breweries in CollectionView. Add SearchBar (filter by name/city).

title: Brewery Detail Page
body: Display address, phone, website. Add 'Open in Maps' button.

title: API Integration (Open Brewery DB)
body: Replace JSON with API fetch. Add refresh button.

title: Create BeerNote Model & DB
body: Define BeerNote.cs. Setup SQLite NotesDb.

title: Notes Page
body: List saved notes. Add new note form. Delete note option.

title: Create BrewEvent Model & DB
body: Define BrewEvent.cs. Setup SQLite EventsDb with sample seed.

title: Event List Page
body: Show upcoming events. Add filter by category. Add search bar.

title: Add/Edit Event Page
body: Form for title, description, date/time, venue. Save to DB.

title: Event Detail Page
body: Show event details. 'Open in Maps' button. 'Add to Calendar (.ics)' export.

title: Enable MAUI Maps
body: Add UseMauiMaps() in MauiProgram.cs. Confirm location permission prompts.

title: Brewery Pins
body: Display sample breweries on map.

title: Event Pins
body: Overlay event locations with labels.

title: UI Theme & Branding
body: Add app icon + splash screen. Apply fonts & colors.

title: Age Gate (21+)
body: Add age confirmation on first launch. Save preference in SecureStorage.

title: Performance Profiling
body: Log startup times. Test with 500+ sample events. Optimize SQLite queries.

title: README + Screenshots
body: Add screenshots to docs/screenshots/. Update README with images.
